title: First time ranked, if I don't finish my placement matches will it effect my elo in season 8 ?
body: I just played my first ranked game and we got crushed, so much so that I'm thinking of not finishing my placements. I've heard that your rank follows you from season to season even though they claim there is a "reset" - I don't want to go into season 8 as bronze, so if I don't finish my placements will that still effect my elo going into season 8 or do you have to actually be placed for the ranked system to effect you permanently?
